references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of large language models, introducing the concept of few-shot learning and significantly advancing the capabilities of LLMs.

references.paper_title: Palm: scaling language modeling with pathways
references.reason: This paper details the development of PaLM, a significant and influential large language model that pushed the boundaries of model size and demonstrated impressive results across a range of NLP tasks.

references.paper_title: Llama: Open and efficient foundation language models
references.reason: This paper introduced LLaMA, a notable open-source large language model that played a significant role in advancing accessibility and fostering further research in the LLM field.

references.paper_title: Qwen-vl: A frontier large vision-language model with versatile abilities
references.reason: This paper introduces Qwen-VL, a significant vision-language model that advanced the capabilities of LLMs in understanding and generating both text and visual information, making it highly relevant to the work in this paper.

This paper details Llama 3, another influential family of large language models that demonstrates significant advancements in the capabilities and performance of LLMs, particularly relevant given the continual pre-training focus of this paper.
